channel.title: Comments on: BoardGameGeek.Con 2011
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Marc Majcher
item.dc:creator: Marc Majcher
item.description: You weren't the only one who didn't like Panic Station there - in fact, only one person that I talked to said that they liked it, the rest had not-so-good to downright horrible things to say about it. I didn't get a chance to give it a try, but from what I heard, it can go on the wait list.
item.content:encoded: You weren’t the only one who didn’t like Panic Station there – in fact, only one person that I talked to said that they liked it, the rest had not-so-good to downright horrible things to say about it. I didn’t get a chance to give it a try, but from what I heard, it can go on the wait list.
